title: Strengthening Business Practice Competencies: Online Language Education Design and Implementation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can plan language education projects by applying online instructional design principles (analysis-design-development-implementation-evaluation).
Learners can establish suitable online education strategies based on learner analysis (age, occupation, technology accessibility).
Learners can design PBL activities optimized for mobile environments (collaborative writing, feedback systems).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
